      • setOnRangeBarChangeListener

        public void setOnRangeBarChangeListener(RangeBar.OnRangeBarChangeListener listener)
        Sets a listener to receive notifications of changes to the RangeBar. This will overwrite any existing set listeners.
        参数:
        listener - the RangeBar notification listener; null to remove any existing listener

      • setPinTextListener

        public void setPinTextListener(RangeBar.OnRangeBarTextListener mPinTextListener)
        Sets a listener to modify the text
        参数:
        mPinTextListener - the RangeBar pin text notification listener; null to remove any existing listener

        public void setTickHeight(float tickHeight)
        Sets the height of the ticks in the range bar.
        参数:
        tickHeight - Float specifying the height of each tick mark in dp.

        public void setBarWeight(float barWeight)
        Set the weight of the bar line and the tick lines in the range bar.
        参数:
        barWeight - Float specifying the weight of the bar and tick lines in px.

      • setRangeBarEnabled

        public void setRangeBarEnabled(boolean isRangeBar)
        Set if the view is a range bar or a seek bar.
        参数:
        isRangeBar - Boolean - true sets it to rangebar, false to seekbar.

      • setTemporaryPins

        public void setTemporaryPins(boolean arePinsTemporary)
        Set if the pins should dissapear after released
        参数:
        arePinsTemporary - Boolean - true if pins shoudl dissapear after released, false to stay drawn

      • setPinRadius

        public void setPinRadius(float pinRadius)
        If this is set, the thumb images will be replaced with a circle of the specified radius. Default width = 20dp.
        参数:
        pinRadius - Float specifying the radius of the thumbs to be drawn.

      • getTickStart

        public float getTickStart()
        Gets the start tick.
        返回:
        the start tick.

        public float getTickEnd()
        Gets the end tick.
        返回:
        the end tick.

      • getTickCount

        public int getTickCount()
        Gets the tick count.
        返回:
        the tick count

      • setRangePinsByIndices

        public void setRangePinsByIndices(int leftPinIndex,
                                  int rightPinIndex)
        Sets the location of the pins according by the supplied index. Numbered from 0 to mTickCount - 1 from the left.
        参数:
        leftPinIndex - Integer specifying the index of the left pin
        rightPinIndex - Integer specifying the index of the right pin

      • setSeekPinByIndex

        public void setSeekPinByIndex(int pinIndex)
        Sets the location of pin according by the supplied index. Numbered from 0 to mTickCount - 1 from the left.
        参数:
        pinIndex - Integer specifying the index of the seek pin

      • setRangePinsByValue

        public void setRangePinsByValue(float leftPinValue,
                                float rightPinValue)
        Sets the location of pins according by the supplied values.
        参数:
        leftPinValue - Float specifying the index of the left pin
        rightPinValue - Float specifying the index of the right pin

      • setSeekPinByValue

        public void setSeekPinByValue(float pinValue)
        Sets the location of pin according by the supplied value.
        参数:
        pinValue - Float specifying the value of the pin

      • isRangeBar

        public boolean isRangeBar()
        Gets the type of the bar.
        返回:
        true if rangebar, false if seekbar.

      • getLeftPinValue

        public java.lang.String getLeftPinValue()
